titles.title: A concurrent resolution providing for adjournment of the House from July 15, 1987, until July 20, 1987.

action.text: Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 7/9/1987--Introduced. Provides for an adjournment of the House of Representatives from July 15 to July 20, 1987.
